name: SkandikaOne
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: console one
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With the Skandika One skill for Amazon Alexa you are able to control the complete setting of a Skandika Fitness equipment via voice commands. Including start and turn off, resistance control.

Example:
 Alexa, open Console One, console START.
 Alexa, open Console One, level UP.
 Alexa, open Console One, set level 5. 
 Alexa, open Console One, console STOP.

Command List:
 START: Alexa, open console one, Console Start .
 STOP: Alexa, open console one, Console Stop.
 RESET: Alexa, open console one, Console Reset.
 Resistance UP: Alexa, open console one, Level UP. 
 Resistance DOWN: Alexa, open console one, Level DOWN.
 RECOVERY : Alexa, open console one, enter Recovery mode.
 Resistance Level set: Alexa, open console one, set level XX. (XX=1~32)
 
Setup Instructions:
 1. Keep the Device Id before enabling the skill
 2. Login using Amazon Email Id for linking the Skandika fitness device to your Alexa account
